description:
Bandwidth updates have been known to cause queues to backup. We need a way to throttle, or in cases, disable these bandwidth updates.

A `bandwidth_update_interval` that describes the number of seconds between updates is probably the best approach. A value of '0' to disable updates is also desired.
title: Throttle bandwidth updates to parent cells

comments.content:
